name.es-419: Cerradura TAJ Serie L para Hoteles
name.pt-BR: Fechadura TAJ Série L para Hotéis

short.en-US: Slim hotel lock with mechanical backup and PMS integration
short.zh-CN: 纤薄酒店锁，带机械备份和 PMS 集成

short.pt-BR: Fechadura slim com backup mecânico e integração PMS
short.de-DE: Schlankes Hotelschloss mit mechanischer Sicherung und PMS-Integration
short.fr-FR: Serrure mince avec secours mécanique et intégration PMS
short.ar: قفل فندقي نحيف مع نسخة احتياطية ميكانيكية وتكامل PMS

requirements.en-US: Zigbee gateway recommended for multi-floor deployments
requirements.zh-CN: 多楼层部署建议使用 Zigbee 网关
requirements.es-419: Se recomienda puerta de enlace Zigbee para implementaciones multi-piso
requirements.pt-BR: Gateway Zigbee recomendado para implementações multi-andar

alt.en-US: Slim hotel smart lock in silver finish, battery-powered, Zigbee + BLE + NFC
alt.zh-CN: 银色纤薄智能酒店锁，电池供电，支持 Zigbee + BLE + NFC
alt.es-419: Cerradura inteligente delgada acabado plateado, a batería, Zigbee + BLE + NFC
alt.pt-BR: Fechadura inteligente slim acabamento prata, bateria, Zigbee + BLE + NFC
alt.de-DE: Schlankes Smart-Hotel-Schloss in Silber, batteriebetrieben, Zigbee + BLE + NFC
alt.fr-FR: Serrure intelligente mince finition argentée, sur batterie, Zigbee + BLE + NFC
alt.ar: قفل فندقي ذكي نحيف بتشطيب فضي، يعمل بالبطارية، Zigbee + BLE + NFC

name.en-US: TAJ KL-Series Smart Lock with Camera
name.zh-CN: TAJ KL系列带摄像头的智能锁

name.pt-BR: Fechadura Inteligente TAJ Série KL com Câmera
name.de-DE: TAJ KL-Serie Smart Lock mit Kamera
name.fr-FR: Serrure Intelligente TAJ Série KL avec Caméra
name.ar: قفل TAJ الذكي سلسلة KL مع كاميرا

short.en-US: Advanced lock with face recognition, video intercom, and camera
short.zh-CN: 具有人脸识别、视频对讲和摄像头的高级锁
short.es-419: Cerradura avanzada con reconocimiento facial, videoportero y cámara

requirements.en-US: Wi-Fi or Zigbee gateway for video intercom; cloud storage for recordings
requirements.zh-CN: 视频对讲需要 Wi-Fi 或 Zigbee 网关；云存储用于录像

alt.en-US: TAJ KL-series smart lock with integrated camera in silver finish
alt.zh-CN: TAJ KL 系列集成摄像头的银色智能锁

short.en-US: Optimized for short-term rentals with mobile wallet keys
short.zh-CN: 为短期租赁优化，支持移动钱包密钥

requirements.en-US: Mobile app (TTLock or Tuya) required for guest code management
requirements.zh-CN: 需要移动应用程序（TTLock 或 Tuya）进行访客代码管理

alt.en-US: TAJ S-series slimline smart lock for vacation rentals in silver
alt.zh-CN: TAJ S 系列超薄智能锁，用于度假租赁，银色

notes.en-US: Can encode and dispense RFID cards at check-in
notes.zh-CN: 可在入住时编码和分发 RFID 卡

notes.en-US: Can print QR codes or issue wallet passes for mobile access
notes.zh-CN: 可打印二维码或发行钱包通行证以进行移动访问
